sentence.Network_en: Roman Catholic a diplomatic representative of the Pope ranking below a nuncio.
sentence.Network_cn: (罗马天主教的)一位外交代表,他隶属于位于罗马教廷使之下的罗马教皇队.

sentence.Network_en: Some cover vast cultural distances: the nuncio in Algeria was born in Taiwan.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些使节则跨越了很大的文化差异: 驻阿尔及利亚的大使出生于台湾.

一些翻译~（转的~） ... mother 修女 nuncio 罗马教皇的使节 open air Mass 露天弥撒.

list.abs: the papal nuncio called on AlAzhar , the highest seat of learning in the Sunni Muslim world , to refute the Byzantine emperor's argument .罗马教皇特使呼吁逊尼穆斯林最高学府爱资哈尔大学指出反驳拜占庭皇帝的依据。
因此教宗可以算是万王之王，而教宗的特使(Papal nuncio)也是欧洲使节团的团长（Dean of the Diplomatic Corp）。在过去教会常常 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Italian, from Latin nuntius 'messenger'

entry.tran: 罗马教皇的使节;教廷大使
entry.def: In the Roman Catholic church, a nuncio is an official who represents the Pope in a foreign country.

means.word_mean: 1. (Roman Catholic Church) a diplomatic representative of the Pope having ambassadorial status

auth_sentence.content: He promised to pass on the testimonies to the papal nuncio.

auth_sentence.content: Responding, Mr Zapatero made great play of complaining to the papal nuncio in Madrid.
